body:
##### Modifications
 - [x] Added DFLAGS to the `make.inc` file being written. These macros are also added to the language specific variables like CFLAGS, CXXFLAGS and FCFLAGS. 
- [x] Changed `spec.satisfies('foo')` with `'foo' in spec` in `intel-mkl`, see #4135. 
- [x] Added a basic build interface to `intel-mpi`.
- [x] Don't re-raise from `__exit__` as it doesn't respect the context manager protocol.
title: cp2k: fixed compilation issues for intel stack
